cluster_relations.rel_desc: The essay will cover the different types of body language.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a document, text, or discourse takes the object as its main topic or subject matter.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The essay will discuss how body language affects social interactions.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a document or discourse is about, discusses, or focuses on a given topic or subject.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a document or discourse is about, discusses, or focuses on a given topic or subject.
args.justification: Both relations represent the same document-to-topic aboutness predicate. Normalize RelR_73c6366941df to use the same relation class (document_subject_relation) and broad group (ABOUTNESS) as RelR_8d4942082ed4, and align the canonical description so this predicate is consistently defined across instances.
